			<h1>
    "People quite frankly have panicked, and they’re buying bikes like toilet paper.” 		</h1>

    <div class="post-info">
        <div style="line-height: 16px;" class="a2a_kit a2a_default_style">
            <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="/#facebook" target="_blank" class="a2a_button_facebook">
                    <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Facebook" data-pagespeed-url-hash="1380872942" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" border="0">
            </a>
            <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="/#twitter" target="_blank" class="a2a_button_twitter">
                    <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Twitter" data-pagespeed-url-hash="1718369765" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" border="0">
            </a>
            <a class="a2a_dd" href="https://www.addtoany.com/share#url=https%3A%2F%2Fsmarthernews.com%2Farticle%2Fbike-industry-analyst-jay-townley-human-powered-solutions-on-the-spike-in-bicycle-sales-during-the-covid-19-pandemic%2F&title=Bike%20industry%20analyst%20Jay%20Townley%2C%20Human%20Powered%20Solutions%2C%20on%20the%20spike%20in%20bicycle%20sales%20during%20the%20COVID-19%20pandemic.%20-%20SmartHer%20News">
                    <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Share" data-pagespeed-url-hash="3681833499" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" border="0">
            </a>
        <div style="clear: both;"></div></div>
    </div>
    <div class="post-excerpt">
    <p>Bike industry analyst Jay Townley, Human Powered Solutions, on the spike in bicycle sales during the COVID-19 pandemic.</p>    </div>

    <div class="featured-image">
    <img src="https://smarthernews.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/frank-mckenna-132739-unsplash-scaled.jpg" class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image" alt="" srcset="https://smarthernews.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/frank-mckenna-132739-unsplash-scaled.jpg 2560w, https://smarthernews.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/frank-mckenna-132739-unsplash-scaled-600x480.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 640px) 100vw, 640px" data-pagespeed-url-hash="1133605460" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" height="512" width="640">    </div>
        <div class="article-post">
          <ul>
<li>Townley says bike sales haven’t rallied to this point since the 1970s oil crisis in America.</li>
<li>Townley: an estimated 90% of all bicycles come from China.</li>
<li>Americans are buying bikes as a social distance activity as well as an alternative to public transportation. The rush to bikes has resulted in a supply shortage.</li>
<li>Fun fact: Some countries, like Italy, have started to incentivize their public to invest in a bike.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>READ MORE: </strong></p>
<p><a href="https://apnews.com/39b3691b8e1ea3d74d1280a75e451a36">Pandemic leads to a bicycle boom, and shortage, around world</a></p>

      </div>    </div>
</div>
